sections.title: Book Reviews Books Received BOOKS RECEIVED
paragraphs: Books listed below that are marked with a "t will be reviewed in a future issue. Readers who wish to review books for the journal should write, outlining their qualifications, to: Graeme Hirst, book review editor, Department of Computer Science, University of Toronto, Toronto, Canada M5S 1A4. Obviously, we cannot promise the availability ol." books in anyone's exact area of interest.
Authors and publishers who wish their books to be considered for review in

sections.title: Computational Linguistics
paragraphs: should send a copy to the book review editor at the address above. All books received will be listed, but not all can be reviewed.

Non-Well-Founded Sets (CSLI Lecture Notes Number 14) by Peter Aczel (University of Manchester, England) Center for the Study of Language and Information, Stan-ford University, Stanford, CA, 1988, xx+131 pp. (Distributed by the University of Chicago Press) ISBN 0-937073-21-0, $34.95 (hb); ISBN 0-937073-22-9, $15.95 (sb)

Agreement in Natural Language: Approaches, Theories, Descriptions edited by Michael Barlow and Charles Albert Ferguson Center for the Study of Language and Information, Stan-ford University, Stanford, CA, 1988, xiv+355 pp. (Distributed by the University of Chicago Press) ISBN 0-937073-02-4, $35.00 (hb)

From First Words to Grammar: Individual Differences and Dissociable Mechanisms by Elizabeth Bates, Inge Bretherton, and Lynn Snyder (University of California, San Diego; Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO; Denver University, Denver, CO) Cambridge University Press, 1988, xii+326 pp. ISBN 0-521-34142-6, $34.50 (hb)

Computer Models of Mind: Computational Approaches in Theoretical Psychology (Problems in the Behavioural Sciences 5) by Margaret A. Boden (University of Sussex, England) Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, England, 1988, xi+289 pp. ISBN 0-521-24868-X, $42.50 (hb); ISBN 0-521-27033-2, $15.95 (sb)
Fondamenti di Informatica Linguistica by Roberto Busa Vitae Pensiero, Milan, Italy, 1987, 412 pp. ISBN 88-343-6904-1, L.50,000 (sb)
